name: OSC
author: kafeijao
description:
This mod adds some extra OSC endpoints to ChilloutVR. If something is not working create an [issue in github](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/issues)

__**Props**__
- Set/Read prop location
- Set/Read synced params
__**Tracking**__
- Listen to tracking data (location/battery) from `Trackers`, `Controllers`, `HMD`, `Base Stations`, and `Play Space`.
__**ChatBox**__
- Send ChaBox messages and typing events

__**New**__ [python library](https://github.com/kafeijao/cvr_osc_lib_py) to abstract this OSC API with examples!

Refer to the [IN-DEPTH](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/OSC) documentation for more information.

**Optional Requirements**
- [ChatBox](https://api.cvrmg.com/v1/mods/download/168)
changelog:
- Fixed an issue that broke using trackers in VR (they would freeze)
- Reintroduced the /config endpoint for older OSC compatibility
- Minor other fixes that I forgot
